DOC.brief_summary: The main objectives of this study are: - To evaluate the driving capacities in a population of elderly subjects with early stage Alzheimer Disease (AD) in a real-life situation. - Define a typology of the main errors made in this population. - Propose adaptive measures or technological aids that would make it possible for these patients to maintain their ability to drive a car while limiting risk.
DOC.brief_title: Ability to Drive of Early Stage Alzheimer Disease
